results.name: a(n) = 3*n*(n + 5)/2.
comment: a(n) equals the number of vertices of the A256666(n)-th graph (see Illustration of initial terms in A256666 Links). - _Ivan N. Ianakiev_, Apr 20 2015
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (3,-3,1).
formula: a(n) = 3*n + a(n-1) + 6 for n>0, a(0)=0. - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Aug 03 2010
program: (PARI) concat(0, Vec(3*x*(3 - 2*x)/(1 - x)^3 + O(x^100))) \\ _Michel Marcus_, Apr 20 2015
xref: The generalized pentagonal numbers b*n+3*n*(n-1)/2, for b = 1 through 12, form sequences A000326, A005449, A045943, A115067, A140090, A140091, A059845, A140672, A140673, A140674, A140675, A151542.
